subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] How long should I run a session?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Long sessions can be very tedious to go through.  If you slow the play
back, you might find even more. Sometimes there's even a continuation of a
message in reverse.

 F-S

On Sun, Oct 24, 2010 at 6:25 PM, imrudym <imrudym@yahoo.com> wrote:

>

> I have recently started doing EVP Maker sessions in my home and have gotten
> results (Rudy's Folder) from two of the first four sessions. I have only
> been doing five minute sessions at a time. Is this too long or too short of
> a session time?
>
> 
>
